content.name: lcc
content.description: (Applies to physical deployments only.) Information about Link Control Cards (LCCs) in the storage system.

attributes.name: emcSerialNumber
attributes.description: EMC serial number for the LCC.

attributes.name: vendorSerialNumber
attributes.description: Vendor serial number for the LCC.

attributes.name: emcPartNumber
attributes.description: EMC part number for the LCC.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: Manufacturer's model number for the LCC.

attributes.name: slotNumber
attributes.description: Slot number where the LCC is located in the parent enclosure.

attributes.name: parentDae
attributes.description: Parent Disk Array Enclosure (DAE) of the LCC.

attributes.name: sasExpanderVersions
attributes.description: Revision numbers of the LCC firmware.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the LCC, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: needsReplacement
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the LCC needs replacement. Values are:
  • true - LCC needs replacement.
  • false - LCC does not need replacement.

attributes.name: parent
attributes.description: Resource type and unique identifier of the LCC's parent enclosure.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the LCC instance.

attributes.name: vendorPartNumber
attributes.description: Vendor part number for the LCC.
